籤詩版本二:
Spring yana zuwa, furanni suna yin furanni a baranda, kuma motoci masu tafiya dubban mil suna kawo taska.
Idan ka sami igiyar Yumen mataki na uku, zai zama kamar tsawa a ƙasa
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar hoton ganawa da sarki a kotu.
Komai yana da kyau sosai.
解曰:
Aka nada sarki. Kamar dukiyar da aka samu a cikin talauci. Bi zuciyarka. Na farko a cikin hexagrams.
Wannan alamar tana bin sha'awar zuciyar ku. Kome lafiya.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yuan uku a cikin kasuwanci
Shang Ren (1414-1486), suna mai ladabi Hongzai, laƙabi da Suting, lakabin Wenyi, ɗan asalin Chun'an ne, Zhejiang, China. An haife shi a ranar 25 ga Fabrairu, shekara ta goma sha biyu ta Yongle a daular Ming.
Mahaifinsa ko kakanninsa ba jami'ai bane, amma malamin Wang Rui ya sami tagomashi tun a farkon shekarunsa, a shekara ta 10 ta Xuande a daular Ming (1435), ya zama na farko a jarrabawar lardin (Xie Yuan) daga baya. , ya fadi a jarrabawar sau da dama, don haka ya sadaukar da kansa wajen yin karatu a Taixue, kuma makarantar Imperial Academy tana matukar kaunarsa, Li Shimian ya yaba da cewa a shekara ta 10 ta Zhengtong (1445), ya zama na daya a jarrabawar Huiyuan (Huiyuan). ), sannan ya zama na farko a cikin jarrabawar fadar (Zhuangyuan). A daular Ming, kawai Huang Guan da shi, waɗanda Zhu Di ya kore su, sun sami wannan karramawa.
聖意: Sa'a a gida, arziki, sa'a a kasuwanci, sa'a a aure, nasara a Liujia, bushara ga matafiya, bishara a gona, tsutsotsi, sa'a a cikin dabbobi, wadatar mutane, rama, shari'a, nasara. , hijira, sa'a a cikin bata, rashin lafiya, Anshan da kaburbura
